label: ham
subject: Renewable Power Project Finance  April 30-May 2, 2007  NY NY
body: 60 (return) [ I have consulted a rare and curious treatise of M. DÕAnville, (sur lÕAncienne Jerusalem, Paris, 1747, p. 75.) The circumference of the ancient city (Euseb. Preparat. Evangel. l. ix. c. 36) was 27 stadia, or 2550 _toises_. A plan, taken on the spot, assigns no more than 1980 for the modern town. The circuit is defined by natural landmarks, which cannot be mistaken or removed.]
